entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
